items.title: Jailbreak tvOS 10.2.2 Apple TV Guide [greeng0blin]

items.title: [Jailbreak Tweak] Retry failed Face ID unlocking attempts automatically with PearlRetry
items.summary: Face ID is an incredibly convenient way of unlocking your iPhone X… that is, when it works. The modern security feature sometimes skips out on us when we need it the most, and retrying it requires you to follow cumbersome steps. Fortunately, iOS developer gilshahar7 has released a new free jailbreak…

items.title: Jailbreak iOS 10 - iOS 10.2 iPad Pro Tutorial
items.summary: Jailbreak iOS 10 - iOS 10.2 iPad Pro Tutorial with Yalu Jailbreak for: iPad Pro, running iOS 10.0-10.2 You need: The Yalu beta application, in .ipa format. 1) Download Cydia Impactor to your computer. 2) Download yalu102 Beta to your computer. 3) Launch Cydia Impactor and connect your device to your computer.
